Sequential ModuleÂ¶

This module contains all classes to be used for the sequential operation of the NanoCET device by a customer.

For this reason the GUI components lead through the experimental workflow in a sequential fashion, only ever displaying or giving access to a subset of the experiment.

While models.experiment.MainSetup models all the intended functionality of one experiment, the sequence is actually imposed by the GUI, defined in :py:module:`views.sequential_window`

sequential.models

The models for the sequential operation of the NanoCET.

sequential.views

The module containing all GUI elements of the sequential software.
